name: 02-Data-Description-and-Preparation
content:
Data Description and Preparation

Data Description

Two datasets are used:

  1. Customer Invoice Data (1,712 rows × 8 columns):
  • Customer_ID (int): Unique identifier for each customer.
  • Invoice_Num (string): Unique invoice identifier.
  • SalesOrder_Num (string): Sales order reference.
  • SalesOrder_Dt (string): Date of sales order.
  • Sales_NetAmount (float): Transaction value.
  • Invoice_Dt (string): Invoice date.
  • Product_Cd (string): Purchased product code.
  • Transaction_Type (string): Transaction type (e.g., sales, returns).

2.Parent-Product Mapping Data (46 rows × 2 columns):

  • Parent_Prd (string): Parent product grouping.
  • Product_Cd (string): Associated product code.

The data covers transaction-level granularity, linking customers to purchased products over time.

Data Preparation

  • Data Cleaning: Handle missing values, check for duplicate invoices, and validate data types.
  • Data Transformation: Convert dates into proper datetime format, normalize transaction values.
  • Feature Engineering:
  • Build RFM metrics (Recency, Frequency, Monetary).
  • Construct customer-product interaction matrix.
  • Map products to their parent categories for hierarchical analysis.
  • Encoding: Transform categorical variables into numerical representations where required.
  • Aggregation: Aggregate transactions at customer-product and customer-parent-product levels.
